alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 25 at 1:32PM CST until November 26 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Rockwall, Kaufman and Hunt Counties. Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage this evening to 10.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to 15.3 feet tomorrow evening. It will fall below flood stage again early Sunday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
